cells.data:
Going over the asm programs

Using .word to store array in memory
Using .space to make space in bytes for values
Labels vs. Addresses

## Adressing Modes

Absolute (Direct): Go to specific memory location like 0x1000
Register-Indirect: Go to regiister specified place (like a pointer!)
Displacement: Go to a constant location and offset it to find the memory

Indirect addressing for pointers `la`
